inputs: He looked really great, his smile wide as he exclaimed, 'This day is good, and it's only getting better with every moment!'
The day is beautifully sunny, putting everyone in a good mood; Emma walks through the park with a joyful heart, enjoying the warmth on her skin.
Amazing performance! ...if you appreciate good music.

What a great day! ...if you ignore the slight wind.
